[![](https://i0.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2004/08/249056.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photo.gne?id=249056 "photo sharing") [The Hillfoots](http://www.flickr.com/photo.gne?id=249056), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
This is where I grew up, at the base of the Ochils.
